mapper.update:
update BPM_GLOBAL_CONFIG
BPM_ADMIN_NAME = #{bpmAdminName},
BPM_ADMIN_PSW = #{bpmAdminPsw},
BPM_CLIENT_TIMEOUT = #{bpmClientTimeout},
BPM_SERVER_HOST = #{bpmServerHost},
BPMFORMS_HOST = #{bpmformsHost},
BPMFORMS_WEB_CONTEXT = #{bpmformsWebContext},
CONFIG_NAME = #{configName},
CONFIG_STATUS = #{configStatus},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
GMT_TIME_ZONE = #{gmtTimeZone},
HTTP_MAX_CONNECTION = #{httpMaxConnection},
PRE_ROUTE_MAX_CONNECTION = #{preRouteMaxConnection},
SCHEDULER_HOST = #{schedulerHost},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime},
BPM_API_HOST = #{bpmApiHost},
where CONFIG_ID = #{configId}

update BPM_GLOBAL_CONFIG set BPM_ADMIN_NAME = #{bpmAdminName}, BPM_ADMIN_PSW = #{bpmAdminPsw}, BPM_CLIENT_TIMEOUT = #{bpmClientTimeout}, BPM_SERVER_HOST = #{bpmServerHost}, BPMFORMS_HOST = #{bpmformsHost}, BPMFORMS_WEB_CONTEXT = #{bpmformsWebContext}, CONFIG_NAME = #{configName}, CONFIG_STATUS = #{configStatus}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime}, GMT_TIME_ZONE = #{gmtTimeZone}, HTTP_MAX_CONNECTION = #{httpMaxConnection}, PRE_ROUTE_MAX_CONNECTION = #{preRouteMaxConnection}, SCHEDULER_HOST = #{schedulerHost}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime}, BPM_API_HOST = #{bpmApiHost} where CONFIG_ID = #{configId}
